price: On the Day when the earth will be rent asunder for them as they hasten forth [from their graves]; that is an easy gathering for Us.
arabic: يَوۡمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ عَنۡهُمۡ سِرَاعٗاۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشۡرٌ عَلَيۡنَا يَسِيرٞ
